page.title: 11NEW HOUSING DEVELOPMENT
page.content: Because of a higher{employment}rate than the national average the {population}is increasing in this area. To cope with the increased demand for {housing}a typical new estate is being built in Townhill park. Most dwellings are semi_detached and have only two bedrooms but some have 3 The houses are usually built in the timber framed style and are normally priced between Â£25.000 and Â£30.000 (July 1985). In this estate, as in most others in the area, there are ample areas for {recreation}and children's play areas. Each house has a garden and some of the larger houses have garages. Street lamps light roads so that car drivers can see if there are any children running around on the road. Most new houses have got central heating.
